text: {{Infobox settlement | name = Niassa | native_name = | native_name_lang = | settlement_type = Province | image_skyline = | imagesize = Lakeside (5888439078).jpg | image_alt = | image_caption = | image_flag = | flag_size = | flag_alt = | image_seal = | seal_size = | seal_alt = | image_shield = | shield_size = | shield_alt = | image_blank_emblem = | blank_emblem_type = | blank_emblem_size = | blank_emblem_alt = | nickname = | motto = | image_map = Niassa in Mozambique.svg | mapsize = 250px | map_alt = | map_caption = Niassa, Province of Mozambique | image_map1 = | mapsize1 = | map_alt1 = | map_caption1 = | subdivision_type = Country | subdivision_name = Mozambique | subdivision_type1 = | subdivision_name1 = | subdivision_type2 = | subdivision_name2 = | established_title = | established_date = | founder = | named_for = | seat_type = Capital | seat = Lichinga | government_footnotes = | government_type = | leader_party = | leader_title = | leader_name = | leader_title1 = | leader_name1 = | total_type = | unit_pref = | area_magnitude = | area_footnotes = | area_total_km2 = 129,056 | area_total_sq_mi = | area_total_dunam = | area_land_km2 = | area_land_sq_mi = | area_water_km2 = | area_water_sq_mi = | area_water_percent = | area_note = | elevation_footnotes = | elevation_min_m = | elevation_max_m = 1836 | population_footnotes = | population_total = 1810794 | population_as_of = 2017 census | population_density_km2 = auto | population_density_sq_mi = | population_est = | pop_est_as_of = | population_demonym = | population_note = | timezone1 = | utc_offset1 = | timezone1_DST = | utc_offset1_DST = | postal_code_type = Postal code | postal_code = 33xx | area_code = (+258) 271 | website = | footnotes = | official_name = }} Niassa is a province of Mozambique. The capital city is Lichinga. The Ruvuma River forms much of the northern boundary of the province with Tanzania. Lake Niassa forms the western border of the province, separating it from Malawi. The province shares the Niassa National Reserve with neighboring Cabo Delgado Province. ==Districts== Niassa Province is divided into the 15 districts of: *Cuamba District *Lago District *Lichinga District *Majune District *Mandimba District *Marrupa District *Ma√∫a District *Mavago District *Mecanhelas District *Mecula District *Metarica District *Muembe District *N'gauma District *Nipepe District *Sanga District and the municipalities of: *Cuamba *Lichinga *Metangula ==References== Category:Provinces of Mozambique
title: Niassa Province
